summary: A young man employed as a fluffer in the adult entertainment industry finds himself falling for a gay-for-pay porn star whose hedonistic lifestyle may lead them both to destruction.

director: Directors: Richard Glatzer, Wash Westmoreland (as Wash West)
title: The Fluffer (el Estimulador)
